name: Doki Doki Sayori Date!
storyline: Sayori Date is a wonderful little mod about taking Sayori on a nice, healthy date! If you want a super sweet mod with absolutely no demonic rituals or references to Cthulhu, then you should 100% play this mod! Sayori is the best girl! 100% the best! Never doubt that!
summary: Doki Doki: Sayori Date! is a wholesome and heartwarming fan-made mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that gives players the chance to go on a full-fledged romantic date with Sayori. Unlike the psychological horror elements of the original game, this mod focuses on lighthearted romance, fun interactions, and deepening your bond with Sayori in a meaningful way.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Just a Normal Date (DDLC Sayori Date MOD) (FULL)
